obfuscation: ﻿ Arguments to take stand against capital punishment Before I joined Amnesty International I had a lot of ideas about the death penalty .
original: ﻿ Arguments to take stand against capital punishment  Before I joined Amnesty International I had a lot of thoughts about the death penalty.

obfuscation: I did n't know whether I was for or against the punishment .
original: I didn't know whether I was for or against the punishment.

obfuscation: nowadays I know for sure that I am against the capital punishment .
original: Now I know for sure that I am against the capital punishment.

obfuscation: My conviction is based on three arguments against death penalty : the state ca n't show that it 's wrong to kill by killing , someone that is not guilty can be convicted and death penalty does not act as a deterrent .
original: My conviction is based on three arguments against death penalty: the state can't show that it's wrong to kill by killing, someone that is not guilty can be convicted and death penalty does not act as a deterrent.

obfuscation: I think that everybody can understand that the relatives of the victim want some sort of revenge on the person who might have killed their class member , but I do n't think a state can show its citizens that something is wrong to do by doing exactly the same thing but in the name of the law .
original: I think that everybody can understand that the relatives of the victim want some sort of revenge on the person who might have killed their family member, but I don't think a state can show its citizens that something is wrong to do by doing exactly the same thing but in the name of the law.

obfuscation: The Government must think in terms of right and wrong and should n't let emotions take over .
original: The Government must think in terms of right and wrong and shouldn't let emotions take over.

obfuscation: People that is affected by a loss , on the other hand , are n't able to remember clearly .
original: People that is affected by a loss, on the other hand, aren't able to think clearly.

obfuscation: Of course we must understand the feelings those people have but I do n't remember that the Government should show that they care about their citizens by killing some of them .
original: Of course we must understand the feelings those people have but I don't think that the Government should show that they care about their citizens by killing some of them.

obfuscation: We have to remember that we ca n't get person we love back by killing someone else .
original: We have to remember that we can't get someone we love back by killing someone else.

obfuscation: I think it 's important to try that people who commit terrible crimes should be punished , but that should be done using other punishments than death penalty for example lifetime punishment .
original: I think it's important to stress that people who commit terrible crimes should be punished, but that should be done using other punishments than death penalty for example lifetime punishment.

obfuscation: One argument you much hear from people who are advocating death penalty is that it is much cheaper to execute a criminal than to keep him or her in prison for life .
original: One argument you often hear from people who are advocating death penalty is that it is much cheaper to execute a criminal than to keep him or her in prison for life.

obfuscation: That is not true , though .
original: That is not true, though.

obfuscation: It has been proved that the trial that precede a death penalty is a lot more expensive than a lifetime punishment .
original: It has been proved that the trial that precede a death penalty is much more expensive than a lifetime punishment.

obfuscation: Even if the trials are very thorough there are however people who are not guilty that get judged .
original: Even if the trials are very thorough there are still people who are not guilty that get judged.

obfuscation: In the USA the majority of the prisoners convicted to death are black men who have lived their lives in poverty .
original: In the USA the majority of the prisoners convicted to death are black men who have lived their lives in poverty.

obfuscation: Poor people ca n't afford the better lawyer and because of that they can be wrongfully convicted .
original: Poor people can't afford the best lawyer and because of that they can be wrongfully convicted.

obfuscation: The possibility to kill an innocent person is reason enough to be against death penalty .
original: The possibility to kill an innocent person is reason enough to be against death penalty.

obfuscation: The Government ca n't pay back the loss it has caused the innocent person 's class .
original: The Government can't pay back the loss it has caused the innocent person's family.

obfuscation: In these cases there is precisely another victim and no problems has been solved .
original: In these cases there is just another victim and no problems has been solved.

obfuscation: People that advocates death penalty maintain that the capital punishment keeps people aside from committing crimes .
original: People that advocates death penalty maintain that the capital punishment keeps people away from committing crimes.

obfuscation: This argument is not true either .
original: This argument is not true either.

obfuscation: In countries where they still have death penalty people commit higher amounts of serious crimes than in countries that make n't have this punishment .
original: In countries where they still have death penalty people commit higher amounts of serious crimes than in countries that don't have this punishment.

obfuscation: I remember that this fact proves that the capital punishment does n't work as a deterrent .
original: I think that this fact proves that the capital punishment doesn't work as a deterrent.

obfuscation: I remember lifetime punishment is much better than death penalty .
original: I think lifetime punishment is much better than death penalty.

obfuscation: I advocate lifetime punishment because I do n't remember a victim or its relatives who might have been harassed by a criminal should fear that it could happen again .
original: I advocate lifetime punishment because I don't think a victim or its relatives who might have been harassed by a criminal should fear that it could happen again.

obfuscation: I also advocate this kind of punishment because if it appears that the person who is convicted is innocent , he or she will however be alive .
original: I also advocate this kind of punishment because if it appears that the person who is convicted is innocent, he or she will still be alive.

obfuscation: Even if you ca n't pay back for years behind bars , the innocent person can live the rest of his life in freedom which you ca n't let a dead person do .
original: Even if you can't pay back for years behind bars, the innocent person can live the rest of his life in freedom which you can't let a dead person do.

obfuscation: I think the better thing a society could do is not to scare people away from committing crimes , but to prevent crime .
original: I think the best thing a society could do is not to scare people away from committing crimes, but to prevent crime.

obfuscation: As an example this could be done by developing a good and more equal school system .
original: As an example this could be done by developing a better and more equal school system.

obfuscation: This is of course very expensive , but if we put an end to capital punishment I think we could afford it .
original: This is of course very expensive, but if we put an end to capital punishment I think we could afford it.

obfuscation: It is not constantly easy to be against death penalty .
original: It is not always easy to be against death penalty.

obfuscation: When you hear about people who rape and kill innocent children it is easy to find that this person deserves to die .
original: When you hear about people who rape and kill innocent children it is easy to feel that this person deserves to die.

obfuscation: I also think it 's quite normal to feel this way , but I still make n't think the Government can show us what we do wrong by doing exactly the same thing .
original: I also think it's quite normal to feel this way, but I still don't think the Government can show us what we do wrong by doing exactly the same thing.

obfuscation: There are many more arguments to take a stand against the capital punishment , but for me the three I have presented here are reasons enough to stop this cruel punishment .
original: There are many more arguments to take a stand against the capital punishment, but for me the three I have presented here are reasons enough to stop this cruel punishment.
